title: Amarillo billboards suggest "vaccines can cause autism"; health experts disagree
author: Kase Wilbanks
description: Health experts and parents are weighing in on a billboard that's caused alarm.At least two billboards in Amarillo claim vaccines can cause autism.It really concerned me when I saw it, because I was like people are going to see this and believe it without
cleaned_text: Tue, 12 Sep 2023 01:24:05 GMT (1694481845226) f21546d3a7b92848c6890935ca4e2b625f015352 4a6d0bb8f30f1b6a167248fbd029e9fd6e7edbb4 News Weather Contests Spotlight Game Center Watch Now 63 Tue 69 Wed 72 Amarillo billboards suggest "vaccines can cause autism"; health experts disagree by Kase Wilbanks Sat, November 12th 2016, 12:10 AM UTC A billboard on Interstate 40 in Amarillo suggests vaccines can cause autism. (ABC 7 Amarillo)
